data.actual_result: Triple clicking your name also highlights your note.
data.expected_result: It should only highlight your name and number,**like it does when you don't have a connection visible on your profile**
data.short_description: When triple clicking your profile while having a note, it copies that also.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have atleast one connection visible in your profile(In Settings) - Click on your profile - Give yourself a note - Triple click your name and discriminators - See how it also highlights your note.
